DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select IC.CreateFiscalDate as [Issue Date], IC.InstallmentContractCode as [Contract Code], A.AccountId as [Account ID], UsrLogin.UserName as [Account Username], UsrEmail.UserName as [Account Username (email)], A.DisplayName as [Account Name], IC.TotalAmount as [Total Due Amount], IC.TotalAmount - IC.FinancedAmount as [Down Payment], IC.FinancedAmount as [Financed Amount], IC.FinancedAmount as [Debit], IC.TargetSettledAmount as [Credit], IC.FinancedAmount - IC.TargetSettledAmount as [Net Balance] from ( select IC.*, ( select Sum(ISD.InstallmentAmount) from tbInstallmentContractDetail ISD where ISD.InstallmentContractId=IC.InstallmentContractId and ISD.SettleDate<=:@TargetDate ) as TargetSettledAmount from tbInstallmentContract IC where IC.CreateFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and IC.CreateFiscalDate<=:@DateTo ) IC left join tbAccount A on A.AccountId=IC.AccountId left join tbLoginAlias UsrLogin on UsrLogin.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrLogin.LoginAliasType=0 left join tbLoginAlias UsrEmail on UsrEmail.AccountId=A.AccountId and UsrEmail.LoginAliasType=1 order by IC.CreateFiscalDate, A.DisplayName, IC.InstallmentContractCode

RichDescItem.Description:
Installment Contract Balance Report

Abstract

“Installment Contract Balance Report” will give you the as-is of installment contract balance as of a selected date.

Generating the report

Parameter Input
While generating the report, input parameters menu presents an intuitive interface.
Built-in wizards will help you quickly and easily create at your choice profile for your site by
 
  • [From date – To Date] – Period to be analysed referred to the Installment Creation Date, select the dates from the calendar.
    • Note: The dates if not specified are to be considered “Fiscal Date”
  •  [As Of] - Select a date from the calendar
Output File Extension
Built-in wizards will help you easily and quickly generate at your choice reports in XLSX or CSV or PDF formats. Format selection is required before running the report.
  • XLSX
    • Report generates an EXCEL (latest version) file
  • CSV
    • its generation requires:
      • Field delimiter: Separator to be put between fields. Usually a "comma". When null, default is taken from user configuration.
      • Quote character: Character used to surround fields
      • Include header line to tick the box. Default is YES.
  • PDF
    • Report generates a PDF (latest version) file

Header

Report parameters:
  • [Execution date/time] - Report Execution Time. Date and Hours format as per configuration [Location, Operating Area, Workstation]
  • [From date – To Date] – Selected Period referred to the Installment Creation Dates
  • [As Of] – Selected Date

Contents (by Colums)

The program produces easy-to-read reports that include text information.
  • [Issue Date] - Contract Issuing Date
  • [Contract Code] - Contract Code
  • [Account ID] - Account ID
  • [Account Username] – Account Username.
  • [Account Username (email)] - Account Login Mail address
  • [Account Name] – Account User Name. Display format: “Last Name, First Name”
  • [Total Due Amount] - Total Due Amount, in local currency
  • [Down Payment] – Deposit, in local currency
  • [Financed Amount] - Total Financed Amount, in local currency
  • [Debit] - Total Amount still to pay, in local currency
  • [Credit] - Total Credit Amount, in local currency
  • [Net Balance] - Net Balance value, in local currency
